title: Wicked Passions 2011 Wicked Pictures
description:
During 2011 Wicked Pictures "Wicked Passions" series transitioned to story-based films; New Sensations "New Romance" in the same year (see attached torrent) became increasingly narrative-based and films could increasingly stand alone, even if the explicit sex had been removed. 


Appetite For Love - http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=91402
Explore the hunger you feel for that special someone, a desire so profound that you thirst for their touch ... Passion erupts as each physical encounter feeds the sensual craving deep within you ... exposing your own special appetite for love ...

Getting Away From It All - http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=91753
There's nothing like escaping the routines of life with that special someone ... a time to celebrate passion, give in to lust. Join five couples as they allow themselves to be swept away in the romance of getting away ...

Heart Strings - http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=92358
Heartbroken Emma (Brooklyn Lee) finds relief when handsome Tommy (Michael Vegas) shows up at the ranch she shares with her sister (Gracie Glam). The attraction between them is immediate as Tommy proves he has a way with troubled horses, guitars and broken hearts. Eventually they find their passion too much to deny. But just as Emma is sure that she's fallen for Tommy, a visitor (India Summer) shows up and reveals a secret about Tommy's true identity. Reeling from betrayal, Emma evicts Tommy from the ranch ... but can she force him from her heart?

A Touch of Seduction - http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=93089
Enjoy these steamy couples as they embrace, caress and ultimately make love. Gazing deep into each others eyes and knowing, without a word, what the other longs for. Eager to fulfill their love`s desires, they touch, taste, kiss, and caress each other into ecstasy. Wicked Pictures presents a softer side of Adult Entertainment with their highly acclaimed Wicked Passions. Set the mood, for yourself, for your lover, get Wicked tonight ... and feel the Passion.

The Fate Of Love - http://www.adultfilmdatabase.com/video.cfm?videoid=98441
After a successful heart transplant saves her life, Caroline (Kirsten Price) is reluctant to date, fearing her former health problems will scare away potential suitors. Her sister is determined to get her back into social circles and while on a weekend camping trip, Caroline has a chance encounter with John (Rocco Reed). Although the two share an instant connection, initially neither one is ready to be more than friends. Eventually, just as they`re ready to move to the next level, a devastating secret from John`s past comes to light and threatens the budding romance. Will these two lovers find a way to overcome all they have endured and find a new beginning together, or can a regretful past truly tempt the fate of love?


Feminist Porn Reviews' Wicked Passions review atsays:

Wicked Passions is the female-friendly imprint of Wicked Pictures, which is one of the top mainstream porn studios. Wicked's main offerings tend to be pretty inoffensive, as mainstream porn goes, and they were the first major studio to mandate the use of condoms in all their movies.

For what it's worth, we generally find Blue's work to be typical of the worst of what "couples porn" has to offer. The scenes we have viewed have been full of the usual sorts of porn clichÃƒÂ©s and simply toned down in the most obvious ways so as not to offend women gratuitously. There is no more genuine female pleasure in Blue's work than in most mainstream porn.

After the first four films [2 in 2010, 2 in 2011], however, the series undergoes a bit of a transformation, as the films become (with one exception) story-oriented, as several of Wicked's usual directors start to participate. Stormy Daniels, Brad Armstrong, Barrett Blade, and Francois Clousot have all directed films in the series. Some of these have been more successful than others, but The Fate of Love (2011), directed by Daniels, and Love Blossoms (2012), directed by Blade, are both well worth watching. That said, the series overall has not been terribly successful, and the releases have been quite slow of late, with just two in the first six months of 2013.
